home.title: Cappy Snacks | Crispy Corn Extruded Snacks | Yummies
home.description: Discover Cappy, crispy corn extruded snacks with intense flavors. Infladitos, Gorditos, and Tornitos with multiple flavor options. Dare to be different! Available in Central America.

contact.title: Contact Cappy | Get in Touch with Us | Yummies Snacks
contact.description: Questions about Cappy? Contact us by phone, email, or form. We're available Monday to Friday to help you. We want to hear from you!

recipes.title: Recipes
recipes.description: Discover creative and delicious recipes with Cappy snacks. From chicken wings to desserts, get inspired with our best culinary combinations.

news.title: News
news.description: Stay up to date with the latest news and events from Cappy.

products.title: Cappy Products | Corn Snacks Infladitos, Gorditos, and Tornitos
products.description: Explore the complete range of Cappy products: Cheese and Butter Infladitos, Intense Cheese Gorditos, Chile Toreado Tornitos and more flavors. Find your favorite.

brands.title: Our Snack Brands
brands.description: Discover Cappy, Zambos, Ranchitas. Each brand with unique and authentic flavors that conquer Central America.

about_us.title: About Us - History and Values
about_us.description: Learn about the history of Cappy, a leading snack company in Central America since 1990. Our mission, values and commitment to quality.

yummiesone.title: Cappy One
yummiesone.description: Discover Cappy One, our new exclusive platform for true snack lovers.

cookie_consent.title: Uso de cookies
cookie_consent.description: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website.
